name: Yurbban Trafalgar
description: Located in the city center of Barcelona, this hotel is connected to the airport and within walking distance of Palau de la Musica Catalana and Arc de Triomf. Also nearby are Casa Batllo and Barcelona Cathedral.

name: All In Hostel / Hotel
description: This hostel is located in Berlin (Friedrichshain), close to Simon-Dach-Strasse, O2 World, and East Side Gallery. Also nearby are Oberbaum Bridge and Stasi Museum Berlin.

name: Kette Hotel
description: Housed in a 16th-century palazzo, this hotel is a 3-minute walk from St. Mark's Square and St. Mark's Basilica. Teatro La Fenice is about a 5-minute walk. The Bridge of Sighs is 0.5 km (0.3 mi) away.

name: Solana Hotel & Spa
description: Situated near the beach in the city center, this spa hotel is close to Mellieha Air Raid Shelter, Mellieha Bay, and Golden Sands Beach. Also nearby are Mellieha Church and Selmun Palace.

name: Hotel Inturprag
description: This hotel is located in Prague (Prague 9), close to O2 Arena, PVA Letnany Exhibition Center, and PVA Expo Praha. Local attractions also include Zizkov Television Tower and Tesla Arena.

name: Hotel Arribas
description: This Sintra hotel is located by the sea, nestled on the beach a short distance from Grande Beach, Macas Beach, and Adraga Beach. Local attractions also include Ursa Beach and Adrenunes Dolmen.

name: Avenida Park Residence
description: This hotel is located in Lisbon (Marques de Pombal), close to Edward VII Park, Castle of Sao Jorge, and Gulbenkian Museum. Also nearby are Rossio Square and Santa Justa Elevator.

name: Hotel Luz Bay
description: Situated 150 metres from the beach, this modern hotel is built in typical whitewashed Algarve style and nestles in the fishing village turned villa community of Luz, six kilometres from Lagos.

name: Hotel & Residence U Tri Bubnu
description: Located in the heart of Prague, this hotel is steps from St. Nicholas Church at the Old Town Square, Old Town Square, and Prague City Hall. Also nearby are Astronomical Clock and Kinsky Palace.

name: Hotel Aramis
description: This hotel is located in Prague (Zizkov), close to Parukarka Park, Zizkov Television Tower, and Prague State Opera. Also nearby are Stadion Eden and Palladium Shopping Centre.

name: Hotel San Cassiano Ca'Favretto
description: The Grand Canal laps this 14th-century Venice palazzo set in a quiet residential neighbourhood, opposite the Ca d'Oro, 200 metres from the Rialto Market, and 700 metres from Piazza San Marco.
promotionDescription: Stay 3 nights and save 20% off your stay!

name: Hotel Astarea
description: Within easy reach of Mlini Beach, Srebreno Beach, and Racic Mausoleum, this Zupa dubrovacka hotel is located by the sea and offers direct access to the beach. Local attractions also include Church of Our Lady of the Snow and St. Nicholas Church.

name: Ayasofya Hotel - Special Class
description: Located in the heart of Istanbul, this family-friendly hotel is steps from Little Hagia Sophia Bath, Cardakli Bath, and Sokollu Mehmet Pasha Mosque. Also nearby are Arasta Bazaar and KumkapÄ± Fish Market.

name: Marmaray Hotel
description: This family-friendly hotel is located in Istanbul (Aksaray), close to Yenikapi Seabus Port, Museum of Turkish Calligraphic Art, and Beyazit Bath. Also nearby are Sehzade Mosque and Beyazit Mosque.

name: Archibald At the Charles Bridge
description: This romantic hotel is located in Prague (Mala Strana), close to Lennon Wall, Charles Bridge, and Clementinum-Prague National Library. Also nearby are Charles University and Rudolfinum.

name: Grand Majestic Plaza
description: This luxury hotel is located in the heart of Prague, walking distance from Palladium Shopping Centre, Republic Square, and Municipal House Hall. Also nearby are Old Town Square and Hybernia Theatre.

name: Aida Hotel
description: This hotel is located in Prague (Prague 8), close to DOX Centre for Contemporary Art, Tesla Arena, and Prague Market. Also nearby are Krizikova Fontana and LunaPark.

name: Muyan Suites - Special Class
description: Located in the heart of Istanbul, this family-friendly hotel is within walking distance of Sokollu Mehmet Pasha Mosque, Arasta Bazaar, and Turkish and Islamic Art Museum. Also nearby are Grand Bazaar and KumkapÄ± Fish Market.

name: Miraparque
description: This hotel is located in Lisbon (Marques de Pombal), near the airport, Edward VII Park, Hospital Dona Estefania, and Hospital Curry Cabral. Also nearby are Castle of Sao Jorge and Gulbenkian Museum.

name: Ottoman Hotel Park - Special Class
description: Located in the heart of Istanbul, this hotel is within walking distance of Esma Sultan Fountain and Cemberlitas Bath. Also nearby are Hippodrome and Grand Bazaar.

name: Aparthotel Susa
description: This aparthotel is located in Prague (Vinohrady), close to Havlicek Gardens, Charles Bridge, and Prague State Opera. Also nearby are Czech National Museum and Zizkov Television Tower.

name: Hotel Verona-Rome
description: This hotel is located in Rome (Monti), close to Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore, Colosseum, and Roman Forum. Also nearby are Teatro dell'Opera di Roma and Diocletian Bath.

name: Royal Court Hotel
description: This spa hotel is located in Prague (Nove Mesto), close to Peace Square, Czech National Museum, and Vysehrad Castle. Also nearby are Charles Bridge and Prague Congress Centre.

name: Millennium Suites
description: Located in the heart of Istanbul, this hotel is near the beach and within walking distance of Mosaic Museum, Gulhane Park, and Hagia Sophia. Also nearby are Blue Mosque and Basilica Cistern.

name: Rialto
description: Dating from the 19th century, this hotel, complete with modernist touches, is located just 50 metres from Las Ramblas on one of the Gothic Quarter's busy shopping streets.

name: Best Western Amber Hotel - Special Class
description: This family-friendly hotel is located in Istanbul (Kumkapi), close to Esma Sultan Fountain, KumkapÄ± Fish Market, and Grand Bazaar. Also nearby are Arasta Bazaar and Museum of Turkish Calligraphic Art.

name: Hotel Domus Aventina
description: This historic 17th-century Rome building is set on Aventino hill, has a pretty courtyard, and is located 100 metres from the Rose Gardens and 200 metres from Villa Celimontana park.

name: Bily Lev Hotel
description: This hotel is located in Prague (Zizkov), close to National Memorial at Vitkov, Zizkov Television Tower, and Charles Bridge. Also nearby are Prague State Opera and Hybernia Theatre.

name: Seifert Hotel
description: This hotel is located in Prague (Zizkov), close to National Memorial at Vitkov, Zizkov Television Tower, and Prague State Opera. Also nearby are Palladium Shopping Centre and Hybernia Theatre.

name: Ocean Serviced Apartments
description: This family-friendly apartment is located in Edinburgh (Leith), close to Newhaven Heritage Museum, Ocean Terminal Shopping Centre, and Royal Yacht Britannia. Also nearby are Royal Botanic Garden and Easter Road Stadium.
promotionDescription: Stay 3 night and save 20% off your stay!

name: Sumengen Hotel - Special Class
description: Located in the heart of Istanbul, this family-friendly hotel is within walking distance of Mosaic Museum, Arasta Bazaar, and Le Arts Turcs. Also nearby are Gulhane Park and Turkish and Islamic Art Museum.

name: Grand Hotel Tiberio
description: Modern hotel close to Vatican City with free shuttle to Romeâ€™s centre & Vatican. Few minutes by foot from Vatican Museums & ST. Peterâ€™s Basilica and close to all major artistic and cultural attraction in Rome.

name: Hilton Manhattan East
description: One block from UN headquarters and 2 blocks from Grand Central Terminal, this hotel occupies a landmark brick building in Midtown East's historic Tudor City neighborhood. Walking distance to finest shopping, dining, and attractions.
longDestinationName: New York (and vicinity), New York, United States of America

name: Novum Hotel Savoy Hamburg Mitte
description: This family-friendly hotel is located in Hamburg (Saint Georg), close to Schauspielhaus, Alster-Schwimmhalle, and Levantehaus. Also nearby are Ohnsorg Theater and Arts and Crafts Museum.

name: Catedral Bas Apartments Barcelona
description: Located in the city center of Barcelona, this apartment is connected to the airport and within walking distance of Diocesan Museum of Barcelona, Palau de la Generalitat de Catalunya, and Palau de la Musica Catalana. Also nearby are Barcelona Cathedral and Placa de Catalunya.

name: Hotel San Sebastiano Garden
description: This romantic hotel is located in Venice (Dorsoduro), close to Church of San Sebastiano, Squero di San Trovaso, and Ca' Rezzonico. Also nearby are Academy Gallery and St. Mary of the Friars.
promotionDescription: Stay 3 night and save 14% off your stay!

name: Hotel Argentina
description: This hotel is located in Florence (Santa Maria Novella), near the airport, Teatro del Maggio Musicale Fiorentino, Leopolda Station Exhibition Center, and Palazzo dei Congressi. Also nearby are San Lorenzo Market and Pitti Vintage.

name: Aquaria Negresco
description: Located in the heart of Madrid, this family-friendly hotel is steps from Plaza de Callao, Gran Via Street, and Preciados Street. Also nearby are Fuencarral Market and Mercado de San Miguel.

name: Hotel Taurus
description: This family-friendly hotel is located in Prague (Vinohrady), close to Zizkov Television Tower, Riegrovy Sady, and Lucerna Palace. Also nearby are Lucerna Arcade and Palladium Shopping Centre.

name: Hotel Santa Marina
description: This small, centrally-located former 15th-century convent is set in the quiet, typical Venetian Santa Marina Square, 300 metres from Venice's Rialto Bridge, one kilometre from St Mark's Square.

name: Ca Marinella
description: This hotel is located in Venice (Castello), close to Chiesa Santa Maria dei Miracoli, Rialto Bridge, and St. Mark's Basilica. Also nearby are Basilica di San Giovanni e Paolo and St Mark's Campanile.
promotionDescription: Stay 3 night and save 5% off your stay!

name: Ottoman Hotel Imperial - Special Class
description: This romantic hotel is located in Istanbul (Sultanahmet), close to Sogukcesme Sokagi, Hagia Sophia, and Basilica Cistern. Also nearby are Topkapi Palace and Blue Mosque.

name: Westbury Hotel
description: This small London hotel is set in a Regency town house in West Kensington, half a mile from Earl's Court, and one mile from the Olympia Exhibition Center.

name: Hacienda Plaza de Armas
description: Located in the heart of Puno, this hotel is steps from Puno Plaza de Armas and Puno Cathedral. Also nearby are Casa del Corregidor and San Antonio Church.

name: Hotel Dona Palace
description: Built in the 15th century by a Venetian noble family, this converted palace overlooks a side canal off Venice's Grand Canal and lies 50 metres from St Mark's Square and Basilica.

name: Hotel Ambassador Tre Rose
description: This hotel is located in Venice (San Marco), close to St Mark's Campanile, St. Mark's Basilica, and Rialto Bridge. Also nearby are Squero di San Trovaso and St. Mark's Square.

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Budapest
description: Situated in Budapest city center, this apart-hotel is 5 minutes walk from the Danube River and West End Shopping Mall. Margaret Island is 1 km (0.62 mi) away. Restaurants, a fresh food marketplace and nightlife venues are also located a few steps away.

name: Soho Hotel
streetAddress: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes 543-545
description: This contemporary hotel, newly opened in 2006, is housed in a striking glass-fronted property situated in the center of Barcelona, 900 meters from the Gothic Quarter.

name: Amadeus Hotel
description: This hotel is located in Venice (Cannaregio), close to Palazzo Labia, St. Mary of the Friars, and Ca' d'Oro. Also nearby are Rialto Bridge and Squero di San Trovaso.

name: Hotel Olga
description: Located in the heart of Prague, this hotel is within walking distance of LunaPark and Tesla Arena. Also nearby are Charles Bridge and Generali Arena.
